content:
## Report

### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity Generator at Position (-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at position (-14.5, 20.0)
- Boiler at position (-11.5, 20.0)
- Steam engine at position (-4.5, 22.5)
- Steam engine at position (-1.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup connecting offshore pump to boilers and steam engines

#### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0)
- Furnace at position (-12.0, -48.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-9.5, -44.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -43.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -46.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -44.5)
- Iron chest at position (-11.5, -44.5)
- BeltGroup connecting furnaces to chests

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when Connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler
- Ensure that the correct type of pipes (either 'Pipe' or 'UndergroundPipe') are used and properly aligned when connecting offshore pumps to boilers.

#### Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available and accessible to the inserters to prevent them from waiting indefinitely.

#### Furnaces Missing Ingredients
- Regularly check and supply the necessary ingredients to furnaces to maintain continuous production.

#### Boilers Out of Fuel
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers and ensure they are regularly refueled to keep the electricity generator operational.

#### Steam Engines Not Connected to Power Network
- Verify that steam engines are properly connected to the power network and have the necessary input liquid to function.

These tips should help mitigate common issues and improve the efficiency of your operations.
